title MCP System
 
participant Interface

control Orc MCP

entity Data MCP

database Database

entity Ollama
 
Interface->Orc MCP: Event fires (camera state change)

 

Orc MCP->Data MCP:Give me ternary data
  activate Data MCP
  activate Data MCP

  Data MCP->Database:Give me relevant data to the query

    activate Database
  deactivate Data MCP
    Data MCP<-Database:Send unstructured data (law and maintenance)
  activate Data MCP
    deactivate Database

  Data MCP->Ollama:Extract information from unstructured data
  deactivate Data MCP
    activate Ollama
    abox over Ollama: Figure out the queries(R/A)
    Data MCP<-Ollama:Give back structured queries
    deactivate Ollama

  activate Data MCP
  Data MCP->Database:Run the RED query

    activate Database
deactivate Data MCP
    Data MCP<-Database:Returns the queried data
    deactivate Database
activate Data MCP
  abox over Data MCP: Check for RED state
alt State is RED
Orc MCP<-Data MCP:Return RED state
activate Orc MCP
else State is AMBER
Data MCP->Database:Run the AMBER query
activate Database
Data MCP<-Database:Returns the queried data
deactivate Database
  abox over Data MCP: Check for AMBER state

Orc MCP<-Data MCP:Return AMBER state

  
deactivate Data MCP
else State is Green
  Orc MCP<-Data MCP:Return GREEN state
  deactivate Data MCP
end
  
  
  Interface<-Orc MCP:Return message
  deactivate Orc MCP
